 2024-09702024-08-28TC
ActPilotage Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Transport of MARIE-CLAUDE CARDIN of Boucherville, Quebec, to be part-time Chairperson of the Laurentian Pilotage Authority, to hold office during pleasure for a term of five years.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Approval of the appointment by the Minister of Transport of MARIE-CLAUDE CARDIN of Boucherville, Quebec, to be part-time Chairperson of the Laurentian Pilotage Authority, to hold office during pleasure for a term of five years.
